Job Title: Manufacturing Planning Planner

Location: Burns Harbor, IN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Cleveland-Cliffs has an immediate opportunity for a Planner to schedule the Casters and Hot Mill at our Burns Harbor facility located in Burns Harbor, IN.

Summary Of Responsibilities

This individual will plan and develop Burns Harbor Caster and Hot Mill schedules, collaborating with Operations and other teams. Responsibilities for the position include the following:

Schedule the casters and hot mill units at our Burns Harbor operation.Resolve scheduling issues with operations management.Participate in and support delivery initiatives and improvements.Resolve production scheduling issues with operations managementAnalyze and complete various reports that pertain to slab application and scheduling dutiesWork with commercial to ensure schedules meet customer requirements.Position will be on call after normal business hours, holidays, and weekends to support scheduling changes as needed by operations or planning.Participate in training activities as needed.

Minimum Qualifications

Ability to demonstrate analytical skills, troubleshooting and strategic thinking.Possess strong attention to detail.Be reasonably proficient in Microsoft Office.

Preferred Qualifications

Production scheduling experience or experience in activities that have supported the scheduling activity.Bachelorâ€™s degree in supply chain management or Operations

Cleveland-Cliffs Inc. is the largest flat-rolled steel company and the largest iron ore pellet producer in North America. The Company is vertically integrated from mined raw materials, direct reduced iron, and ferrous scrap to primary steelmaking and downstream finishing, stamping, tooling, and tubing. We offer an excellent total compensation package including top pay with variable compensation opportunity, health insurance, retirement plan, education assistance, paid time off and more!

Cleveland-Cliffs Inc. is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with disabilities. If, because of a medical condition or disability, you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process, please send an e-mail to careers@clevelandcliffs.com or call 1(312) 899-3097 and let us know the nature of your request and your contact information. Do not email your application materials to this email address. Application materials sent to this email address will not be considered.Cleveland-Cliffs Inc. is an equal opportunity employer - M/F/Veteran/Disability. We are a drug-free workplace and conduct pre-employment screening as a condition of employment.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
